Class DeviceController

java.lang.Object
  org.epri.pt2.listeners.ViewCallback
      org.epri.pt2.controller.DeviceController

public class DeviceController
extends ViewCallback

Add, update, removes, or lists devices associated with a project.

Author:
tdo
